00040 ## application() class
00041 #  
00042 #  The instance of this class generates the application window
00043 class application(wx.Frame):
00044     """Main app window. Everything starts here.
00045        Keeps the main widgets (menu, upper and left toolbar, console, canvas, XML editor, etc.
00046        Initialises or uses the (common) settings object, the state object and the model object."""
00047     ## The constructor. 
00048     def __init__(self, parent, id, title):
00049         wx.Frame.__init__(self, parent, id, title)
00050         # load registered settings and default empty state (menu & co)
00051 
00052         ## @var settings 
00053         #  A dictionary which holds the settings/options for various widgets
00054         self.settings = settings(self)
00055 
00056         ## @var model 
00057         #  A dictionary which holds the model tree structure and the associated files
00058         #self.model    = model()
00059         
00060         ## @var state 
00061         #  A dictionary which accounts for disabled         
00062         #self.state    = state()
00063 
00064         ## @var menuBar 
00065         #
00066         #  A menu widget with resources specified in a XML file. The callbacks to 
00067         #  various menu entries are added when the *Callbacks series of object are 
00068         #  instantiated. 
00069         self.menuBar      = None  # children - submenus
00070         
00071         ## @var upperToolbar 
00072         #
00073         #  A ToolBar widget, grouping several buttons/widgets with resources specified in a XML file. The callbacks 
00074         #  associated to various buttons are binded when the *Callbacks series of object are instantiated.         
00075         self.upperToolbar = None  # children - its buttons
00076 
00077         ## @var leftToolbar 
00078         #
00079         #  A ToolBar widget, grouping several buttons/widgets with resources specified in a XML file. The callbacks 
00080         #  associated to various buttons are binded when the *Callbacks series of object are instantiated.         
00081         self.leftToolbar = None  # children - its buttons
00082                
00083         ## @var canvas 
00084         #
00085         #  An enhanced canvas widget       
00086         #self.canvas       = None
00087         
00088         ## @var XMLEditor
00089         #
00090         #  An enhanced text widget with syntax highlighting, search/replace, etc.          
00091         self.XMLEditor    = None
00092         
00093         ## @var panel 
00094         #
00095         #  A panel widget which groups all the widgets previously created     
00096         self.mainPanel  = None  # children - all the widgets besides the menu and status bar
00097 
00098         ## @var consoleLog 
00099         #
00100         #  A TextCtrl widget which records log entries     
00101         self.consoleLog  = None  # children - none
00102 
00103         ## @var statusBar 
00104         #
00105         #  The statusBar        
00106         self.statusBar    = None # to be expanded to an external class
00107 
00108         self.__createApp()
00109 
00110     def __createApp(self):
00111         """Creates the main application window populated with all the widgets."""
00112         self.menuBar = menuBar(self, self.settings("menu"))
00113 
00114         self.mainPanel = mainPanel(self)
00115         
00116         self.upperToolbar = toolbar(self.mainPanel, self.settings("uppertoolbar"), wx.TB_HORIZONTAL)
00117         
00118         self.leftToolbar = toolbar(self.mainPanel, self.settings("lefttoolbar"), wx.TB_VERTICAL)
00119         
00120         self.XMLEditor = XMLEditor(self.mainPanel, None) # add settings later
00121         
00122         self.consoleLog = consoleLog(self.mainPanel) # add settings and functionality later
00123 
00124         self.mainPanel.addtoPanel(self.upperToolbar, (0, 0, 2))
00125         self.mainPanel.addtoPanel(self.leftToolbar, (1, 0, 1))
00126         self.mainPanel.addtoPanel(self.XMLEditor, (1, 1, 1))
00127         self.mainPanel.addtoPanel(self.consoleLog, (2, 0, 2))
00128         
00129         self.statusBar = self.CreateStatusBar()
00130         
00131         # create these, after the menu, and toolboxes where created (in order for the callbacks to be binded to the appropriate entries)
00132         self.project     = projectIO(self)
00133         #self.GeometryCallbacks    = geometryCallbacks(self, master)
00134         #self.SettingsCallbacks    = settingsCallbacks(self, master)
00135         #self.HelpCallbacks        = HelpCallbacks(self, master)
00136 
00137         self.Show()
00138

00140     def initDrawingArea(self): # should be called after the other widgets are initialiazed.
